context.name: Megan Mehta
context.bio: Megan is currently a sophomore at UIC studying Computer Science and serves as the News Media Director for FCG. As News Media Director, one of Megan's biggest goals is to expose FCG members to new ideas that are emerging in the consulting world. She wants FCG members to remain engaged and know more about current trends and issues circulating in the business world. On campus, Megan is also a member of Alpha Kappa Psi and enjoys spending time with friends, eating food, and exploring the city.
